channel.title: Null item id's?
channel.description: i try to make my own shop with custom items such as dfs, dfh, and other silab items but it wont let me....i have lots of silab items already but wen i go to make a shop and i add the id's and stuff in, i trade the guy and it says all nulls and stuff. Anyone know what i have to do???? also need help with my custom skilling area. I checked the TUT for it but wen i click the object it does not give me xp for that skill at all...Please someone help greatly appreciated. Rep+

item.title: Null item id's?
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

im using silab and how do i add the item to my source?

Read full topic

item.title: Null item id's?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

the server and the client have to be compatible.

In other words, the client you use, might read items differently than a silab client. you have to add the item to the source, as well as the client.

btw you cant rep+ you need 15 rep to do that ;]

Read full topic
